entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Console.ReadKey` throws `InvalidOperationException` on Ctrl+S #99938
  • Individual test building usability #99937
  • [API Proposal] Add APIs that needed for emitting symbols with reflection emit PersistedAssemblyBuilder #99935
    9.0.0
  • High memory consumption using X509Certificate2 GetNameInfo((X509NameType.UpnName, false) #99933
  • Issues with authorization on Blazor wasm #99930
  • Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' #99929
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !m_pMethodBeingCompiled->IsDynamicMethod() #99928
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm SDK] ComputeWasmPublishAssets incorrectly upgrades compressed asset versions of assets that are not included as part of publish. #99917
  • Remove `--fuse-ld=` from Native AOT link argument #99912
    9.0.0
  • Runtime tests for NativeAOT send unnecessary files in Helix payloads #99910
    Future
  • Consider using process snapshotting APIs for System.Diagnostics.Process #99906
  • Static getter Encoding.BigEndianUTF32 is private #99903
  • .Net 6.0 XDocument XML Giving Wrong Value of an Element (Bug) #99899
  • [Net] System Threading Portable Thread Pool + IOCCompletionPoller, WaitOneNocheck and LevelLifoSemaphore almost stop to run. #99896
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler and NSUrlSessionHandler in the same net8.0-ios project causes incorrect 401 runtime errors for NTLM authorized HTTP requests #99892
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler on macOS (net8.0-macos) with network credentials will crash the app #99891
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT but 0 was expected #99888
    9.0.0
  • Process.Linux: handle when proc mount mismatches with pid namespace #99887
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToHGlobalUTF8 is declared as private, but the rest of UTF-8 functions in Marshal are public #99886
  • Test failure: Interop/NativeLibrary/Callback/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix.cmd #99885
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/ArrayLengthArithmetic/ArrayLengthArithmetic.dll #99884
    9.0.0
  • Allow modification of entry assembly and probing after startup hooks are run #99883
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save #15704
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add mechanism for indicating a method/constructor/property violates constraints #99788
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel Foreach #99864
  • Native AOT: Is there any way to link to the hybrid c runtime? #99895
  • NAOT: fold "always false" typechecks #97601
    9.0.0
  • SuperPMI asmdiffs checked release setup (windows x64) - setup failure - `checked_directory doesn't exist` #99923
  • ReadOnlySequence.Slice InvalidCastException #30736
  • Multiple dispose called for chained dependency injection - Is it actual a bug? #97475
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK #95998
    9.0.0
  • Using TypeBuilder as a generic type parameter throws NotSupportedException in AssemblyBuilder created by DefinePersistedAssembly #99505
    9.0.0
  • [Android][arm] System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests time out on Andrid arm #96923
  • ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated test failed in CI #84562
    9.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.BerConverterTests.Decode_Bytes_ReturnsExpected failing on Windows x86 #99725
  • Test failure: Interop/Swift/SwiftAbiStress/SwiftAbiStress/SwiftAbiStress.cmd #99882
    9.0.0
  • [mono] box related IL instruction sequence optimization for interpreter #99379
    9.0.0
  • Error "Hosting components are already initialized. Re-initialization to execute an app is not allowed." #99858
  • For `dotnet/llvm-project` only: Remove ObjWriter cpp code. #99782
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #94821
    9.0.0
  • Time out in Directed_3.0.1 work item #99638

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix null check in RhpLockCmpXchg64 #99934
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Double default initial heap size #99927
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove hasLikelihood checks; make FlowEdge::m_likelihoodSet debug-only #99925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Attribute for ByRefLike generics #99916
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #99915
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add generic parameter checks for fields of generic types #99911
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] make blazor's sendByteArray also fire and forget #99904
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix x86 hardware intrinsics #99894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove scheme check for Proxy on ServicePointManager #99893
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http2 deadlock #99889
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix workloads build by bringing back some needed variables #99932
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing BerConverterTests.Decode_TestData test #99793
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Use release config for Mono tests #99920
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILVerify after kept member validation #99914
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • NativeAOT/x86: Implement ResolveVirtualFunction R2R helper #99913
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update publishing to include *.pkg files #99931
    needs-area-label
  • Fix template parameter name in SuperPMI jobs #99918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix synthetic profile check option, track improper headers #99795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] disable optimizations for PopCount #99926
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK #99907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix indentation in runtimelab pipeline #99921
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix: Using TypeBuilder as generic argument for a parent type throws #99771
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix ComponentGovernance running on public PR/CI jobs #99898
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Fix an invalid use of remainder liveness in physical promotion #99897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix CoreCLR stress pipelines that run libraries tests only #99868
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99843
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Split the negative ref struct substitution testcases to enable the one working with Mono #99826
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough quirk in fgFindInsertPoint #99783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable time tracking in wasm release builds because it's expensive #99841
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] CI was broken for wasm debugger tests #99824
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix prepare-artifacts.proj #99890
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono][interp] Various optimizations for box patterns used in byreflike struct generics #99684
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • some code clean up in heap_select #99855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMarshal.Cast in a few places #99835
    area-Meta
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Port x86 ResumeSP logic from CoreCLR #99866
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use non locking atomic intrinsics #97527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough check in optFindLoopCompactionInsertionPoint #99827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99779
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99776
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    area-Meta
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Use templated encoding helpers for signed and unsigned immediates #99815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Review UnsafeRawPointer projections in C# for CryptoKit dev templates #2529

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] Debug test failed on vscode with 9.0.100-preview.2.24128.5(runtime-9.0.0-preview.2.24127.9) installed. #39114

Updated

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • Wrong "workload not found" message #31835
    8.0.2xx
  • Cannot update workload manifests from authenticated AzDO feeds on macOS #35912
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
    8.0.2xx
  • Retrieving assembly version or other related info without reflection #39555
  • MSBuild: Custom Target after Publish runs before AoT binary is in publish directory #39549

PullRequests

Created

  • Add nuget.localization to dependency flow #39602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to depencency flow #39595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabling codeflow of nuget.localization #39590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39589
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Branding for Preview 4 🦠 #39601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
  • Champion "Null-conditional await" #35
    Any Time
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic Search follow ups #72585
  • [BUG] When i rename record param, not rename all references #72581
    17.11
  • [SUGGESTION] [Minor / Nice to have] Change Quick Fix / Code Action priority #72580
    Backlog
  • Unrequested edits applied to source code when importing existing files #72579

Closed

  • `AdditionalTextWithState.GetText` causes LOH allocations #67057
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractTypeMap #72588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pass the temp path to DesktopStrongNameProvider ctor #72587
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make event-hookup-completion async, and hook up to the background work indicator #72584
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle adding expression body members when generating interface declaration #72583
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump razor EA version to accomodate serialization version bump #72575
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove notification on diagnostic updates in inline-diagnostics #72562
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localize 17.10 branch #72570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ExternalAccess.Xaml fixes #72560
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in NodeExtensions.LogTables #72536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File Input in Blazor SSR not validating #54607
  • HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode single quote behavior does not match documentation #54605
  • Perf regression: json #54604
  • Route Params are not able to validate Guid[] parameters #54602
  • Add APIs for viewing generated OpenAPI file at runtime #54600
    9.0-preview4
  • Announcement: Swashbuckle.AspNetCore is being removed in .NET 9 #54599
  • Add built-in support for generating OpenAPI document from APIs #54598
    9.0.0
  • Endpoint metadata added with `.MapXXX().AddYYY()` can't be accessed in `ActionDescriptor` #54594
  • Blazor WASM: Catch explicit navigation to authentication/login-callback and redirect to login #54586
  • TypeLoadException on web application startup when using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation package #54585
  • [NETSDKE2E]warning CS8618: Non-nullable property 'Http' must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor when building blazorWasm project. #54603

Closed

  • Generated swagger/redoc page doesn't respect inherited descriptions #48982
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, multiple_queries #54583
  • Perf regression: single_query #54584
  • Models used in Minimal API Endpoint Metadata do not respect the Swashbuckle Annotations Attributes #52713
  • Multiple ways to short-circuit pipeline is a poor design and should be reconsidered #54548
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #54575

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor][MT] reduce synchronous calls from JS #54596
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-threading, 9.0.0
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24165.20 #54588
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview3
  • Update Alpine versions #54578
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e1a38bc` to `c231e6f` #54552
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 #54571
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • X2Property binding seems to be unfunctional in a carouselview #21289
  • NET 8 :: Sizing of windows, text buttons and icon buttons are off #21285
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Span TapGesture on Label FormattedString #21284
  • Shell backwards navigation problem by calling wrong OnAppearing/OnDisappearing #21274
    Backlog
  • [Android] Programmatically creating FormattedString Spans with GestureRecognizers causes duplicate Command runs #21273
    Backlog
  • MAUI Collection view is nor resize properly on iOS #21271
    Backlog
  • Scroll not working when placing custom layout in a Scroll view. #21269
  • Application.Current.Quit() is slow in multiwindow Mac Catalyst App #21268
  • [testing] Move test Issue10222 and Issue774 to appium #21267
    Backlog
  • [iOS] button.SetBackgroundImage(image, state) does not work #21265
  • [Android] ListView ContextActions don't show up in modal page #21261
    Backlog
  • SwipeView bug remains transparent with SwipeView.SwipeTransitionMode="Reveal" #21260

Closed

  • 'Platform' does not contain a definition for 'Init' #21253
  • Flyout Icon is not displayed on android. Works fine on Windows. #19178
    .NET 8 SR4
  • XamlC XC0022 warning : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified after upgrade to 8.0.7 #21288
  • [Android] A big image overflow the Button #12054
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [iOS/Catalyst] CollectionView scrolling performance when height is not constrained drops drastically. #18696
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0] Grouped CollectionView in NavigationPage on iOS recreates the grouped header view on every scroll event #18421
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView with non integer height request has atrocious scroll performance #15814
    Backlog
  • iOS Collectionview jitters / scrollskips on iPhone 14 simulators / devices (even in .NET 8) #16877
    .NET 8 SR4
  • RadioButton is not currently being Garbage Collected #20023
    .NET 8 SR4
  • WordWrap doesn't wrap on a Label in a Grid if the ColumnDefinition is set to Auto. #21110
  • Color changes in default project template prevent flyout button from being visible #21280
  • Unit test projects can't reference MAUI projects #21209
  • Label Truncation and MaxLines options do not work when combined #20128
  • Shell 'CurrentPage' property does not have a value to bind it at the first load. #21200
  • Parent doesn't listen the gestures from its child #21227
  • Line Shape not redraw when X2Property change with binding #21258
  • [WinUI] CollectionView - how to prevent full refresh when insert element? #21264
  • Is it already foreseeable when MAUI can be used professionally to develop apps? #21272
  • Using TargetType="{x:Type Button} causes compilation error in Setters of VisualState #21270
  • This problem is easy to occur when debugging the real machine in VS17.9.3+Maui8.0.10, which is stuck all the time, and the phone does not have an application installed. VS17.9.3+Maui8.0.7 is normal. #21247
  • error MSB6006: "java.exe" exited with code 1, happens all the time. Rebuild works fine. #20975
  • Handling macOS app termination process on MAUI multiwindow app #21243
  • On Android, using the {x:Type ...} TypeExtension in Style.TargetType causes a compiler error for VisualState.Setters within the Style #20818
  • [regression/7.0.96] Can't click item or button when scroll ScrollView in IOS #18432
  • Selecting a link in a WebView on iOS causes a NSInternalInconsistencyException #17923
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9511] [iOS] Can't debug or deploy to a physical device #18528
  • [regression/8.0.3] iOS Navbar issue is back #18874
  • [Bug][XAML] Using an intermediate base class for a ResourceDictionary fails to load when XamlCompilation enabled #21008
    Backlog
  • XAML resource keys cannot be extracted into string constants #21196
    Backlog
  • Display a Menu when click expand button wherever in screen #21254
  • MAUI Application performance issue. #21262
  • How to add a bug project directly to the Maui code repository and build this bug project so you can test or find a solution inside the Maui code? #21201
  • Swipe gesture not functioning using two fingers on Touch-pad #20968
  • Crash when app is deployed with dotnet publish #20981

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [main] Merge release/8.0.1xx-sr3 to main #21290
  • Find failing Frame tests in CI #21287
  • Set Shell Foreground to original color distinction #21286
    community ✨
  • Update the Multi-Project styles #21282
  • [X] Improve warning message when a binding cannot be compiled #21281
  • [net9.0] Update all net9 versions preview3 #21276
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Bump Samsung Tizen versions #21275
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [testing] Ignore failing tests #21266
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update Template Shell Foreground colour #20152
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix CanvasImageSource scaling behavior (SR3) #21239
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Optimize performance of Flex.Item #20034
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Remove check allocation tests from core #21283
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #21151
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [X] Allow using x:Type and type literals interchangeably in certain scenarios #20915
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix FontImageSource resize behavior #21212
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button, i/regression
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.6 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮, stale
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Cache full app package file path #21246
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • Add missing Android Systemfonts #21207
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [C] use ResourcesChanged to propagate Theme #21229
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
